name: Machine Gun
game_info: Late-game ranged Unit that must be adjacent to an enemy to strike.
historical_info: Machine gun crews make use of powerful, fully-automatic firearms capable of laying down heavy suppression fire, typically at a rate of several hundred rounds per minute. The Gatling gun, predecessor to many modern machine gun designs, was first developed during the 19th century in the United States. This concept later evolved into the Maxim gun, the first of many self-powered machine guns.
strategy: The Machine Gun is the penultimate non-siege ranged unit. It is more powerful than earlier ranged units. Like the Gatling Gun it has only a one-hex range, but still can deal significant damage to other units without being hurt itself. It is vulnerable to melee attack. Put Machine Guns in your city for defense.
